name: 354 The Stars
description: Led the Front-End team, and made major design decisions for a E-Commerce Application project. Built with React.js, Redux, working with a custom backend RESTful API.

name: Auto Tune
description: A Sheet Music Database built with the MERN Stack. Made to catalog many pages of sheet music for easy access and avoid unnecessary printing. Deployed on Heroku.

name: My Own Website
description: My Personal Website which you are viewing right now, build with React.js and hosted in a Docker container on Heroku.

name: Lab Finder Tool
description: Full Stack Web Application developed for CAE Inc. to recommend the best lab for a simulator issue. Used by Engineers to increase turn around time for solving Simulator issues.

name: Raspberry Pi k3s Cluster
description: A 4 Pi lightweight Kubernetes Cluster built to host my personal Web Applications. Inspired from r/homelab.
